alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, west central Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 305 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Florida A and M to near Woodville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Wakulla, Ralford Greenway, Newport, Apalachee Regional Park, Cody, Chaires Crossroads, Wakulla Springs, Thomas City, Vereen, Capitola, St. Marks Headwaters Greenway, Chaires, Southwood, Fanlew, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Lloyd and Wacissa Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
